section.title: Removing a Query
section.para:
There are largely three ways of removing existing Query in Query Mapping XML file.
Removing through Query Explorer View
Removing through Context Menu
Direct removing through Query Manager Editor

section.title: Removing througg Query Explorer
section.para: When removing Query statement through Query Explorer, select the Query ID at Query Explorer View, then execute "Remove Query" on Context Menu.

section.title: Removing through vContext Menu
section.para: When removing Query statement through Context Menu, select the Query at Design tab of Query Manager Editor, then execute "Remove" on Context Menu.

section.title: Direct removing through Query Manager Editor
section.para: When directly removing Query statement, select the Query at Source tab of Query Manager Editor. In this case, it is the range between <query>and </query> where the Query statement to delete is included.
